import redux from'redux';const counterReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{counter:0};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type==='increment'){return{counter:state.counter+1};}if(action.type==='decrement'){return{counter:state.counter-1};}return state;};// needs pointer to Reducer
const store=createStore(counterReducer);export default store;
